backend/main.mo: Main Motoko backend actor providing user authentication, preferences management, HTTP outcalls for crypto news and price data, alert history persistence, and transformation functions for external API responses.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented visual chart markers (entry points, take-profit levels, stop-loss markers) on the CandlestickChart component with neon cyberpunk styling and glow effects.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend TypeScript/React files including pages, components, hooks, services, and utility modules for technical analysis, trading signals, and chart functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining light and dark theme color schemes using oklch color space, including cyberpunk-themed chart and sidebar colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Rajdhani and JetBrains Mono fonts from Google Fonts and mounting the React application at the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, CryptoDetail, and Alerts pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider (forced dark mode) and Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AddPositionDialo: Empty file placeholder for add position dialog component.
frontend/src/components/AddTradeDialog.t: Empty file placeholder for add trade dialog component.
frontend/src/components/AITradeAnalysisC: Card component displaying AI-generated trade recommendations with direction, confidence score, risk level, entry/exit prices, stop-loss, take-profit targets, and reasoning based on technical indicators and patterns.
frontend/src/components/AlertCard.tsx: Displays an individual alert card with crypto information, signal type (buy/sell/hold), trigger reason, timestamp, and visual styling including glow effects and color coding based on signal type.
frontend/src/components/AlertFilters.tsx: Provides filter controls for alerts by cryptocurrency and signal type (buy/sell/hold) with a reset button to clear all filters.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Renders login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication and initializes user preferences (theme, notifications) on first login.
frontend/src/components/CandlestickChart: Displays a line chart with price data, technical indicators, candlestick patterns, support/resistance levels, and trade recommendations with interactive markers and tooltips.
frontend/src/components/CryptoTable.tsx: Renders a table of cryptocurrencies with market data (price, 24h change, volume, market cap) and trading signals generated from technical indicators for each coin.
Displays technical indicator values (RSI, MACD, Moving Averages, Bollinger Bands) in a grid of cards with color-coded values and status labels.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main application layout with header navigation (Market, Alerts), theme toggle, authentication button, mobile menu sheet, and footer with attribution.
frontend/src/components/MarketSentimentP: Displays market sentiment analysis with fear/greed index, top gainers, and top losers in a three-card grid layout with neon-themed styling and glow effects.
frontend/src/components/PatternLegend.ts: Shows detected candlestick patterns as colored badges (bullish, bearish, or neutral) in a card component.
frontend/src/components/SignalBadge.tsx: Renders a trading signal (buy/sell/hold) as a badge with icon and tooltip showing signal details like reason, confidence, and indicator.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Theme toggle button that switches between dark/light modes and persists user preference to backend via Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/TimeframeSelecto: Tab selector component for switching between 1H, 4H, and Daily chart timeframes.
frontend/src/components/TradingSignalsPa: Displays active trading signals and support/resistance levels in a two-card grid layout with signal badges and price levels.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertHistory.ts: Provides hooks for fetching alert history with filters, last 24 hours alerts, alert statistics, and mutations for saving and clearing alerts via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlertNotifications: Monitors top cryptocurrencies for trading signals and displays toast notifications while saving alerts to backend, checking every 60 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useChartData.ts: Fetches OHLC data for a cryptocurrency, detects candlestick patterns, and calculates support/resistance levels based on selected timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useCryptoPrices.ts: React Query hook that fetches top 30 cryptocurrencies market data with 45-second auto-refresh and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Empty file placeholder for journal-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/usePortfolio.ts: Empty file placeholder for portfolio-related hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useTechnicalIndicator: React Query hook that fetches OHLC data and calculates technical indicators (RSI, MACD, SMA, EMA, Bollinger Bands) for a given coin and timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useTradingSignals.ts: React Query hook that generates trading signals based on technical indicators from useTechnicalIndicators for a specific coin and timeframe.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchlist.ts: Empty file placeholder for watchlist-related hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with cyberpunk dark theme using near-black backgrounds, neon accent colors (cyan, purple, green, red), and custom glow effects with animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Alerts.tsx: Alert history page displaying trading signal alerts with filtering by crypto/signal type, statistics cards, and authentication requirement using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/CryptoDetail.tsx: Detailed cryptocurrency page showing candlestick charts, technical indicators, trading signals, pattern detection, and AI trade recommendations with timeframe selection.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying market overview with crypto table, market sentiment panel, timeframe selector, and auto-refresh every 45 seconds.
frontend/src/pages/Journal.tsx: Empty file placeholder for trading journal page.
frontend/src/pages/Portfolio.tsx: Empty file placeholder for portfolio management page.
frontend/src/services/coingecko.ts: CoinGecko API service providing functions to fetch top cryptocurrencies market data and OHLC (candlestick) data for technical analysis.
frontend/src/utils/aiTradeRecommendation: Generates AI-powered trade recommendations with entry points, take-profit targets (conservative/moderate/aggressive), stop-loss levels, confidence scores, and risk assessments based on technical indicators, trading signals, candlestick patterns, and support/resistance levels.
frontend/src/utils/candlestickPatterns.t: Detects candlestick patterns (Doji, Hammer, Shooting Star, Bullish/Bearish Engulfing) from OHLC data and provides trading action recommendations for each identified pattern.
frontend/src/utils/marketSentiment.ts: Calculates overall market sentiment (bullish/bearish/neutral), fear/greed index, and identifies top gainers and losers based on 24-hour price changes across tracked cryptocurrencies.
frontend/src/utils/supportResistance.ts: Identifies support and resistance levels by detecting local minima and maxima in OHLC data, merges similar levels within a 2% threshold, and ranks them by strength.
frontend/src/utils/technicalIndicators.t: Implements calculations for technical indicators including RSI, MACD, SMA, EMA, and Bollinger Bands using historical price data arrays.
frontend/src/utils/tradingSignals.ts: Generates buy/sell/hold trading signals with confidence levels based on RSI oversold/overbought conditions and MACD crossovers from technical indicators.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with cyberpunk theme featuring custom neon colors (cyan, purple, green, red), custom fonts (Rajdhani, JetBrains Mono), extended color palette with OKLCH values, and custom animations including pulse-glow and fade-in effects.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a crypto swing trading dashboard with cyberpunk UI, real-time price tracking for 20-30 cryptocurrencies, technical indicators, trading signals, CoinGecko API integration, Motoko backend, and Internet Identity authentication.
